..description: The root directory of the project.
..purpose: Contains all the files and directories of the project.

.git.purpose: Contains all the information about the Git repository.

.gitignore.purpose: Specifies which files and directories should be ignored by Git.

AGENTS.md.description: A markdown file containing information for the agent.
AGENTS.md.purpose: Provides the agent with information about the project, the tools available, and the tasks that can be performed.

README.md.purpose: Provides a general overview of the project.

agent.purpose: Contains all the files related to the agent's core logic.

agent/core.py.purpose: Contains the core logic of the agent.

agent/main.py.purpose: Contains the main function for the agent.

api.py.purpose: Contains the functions for interacting with the Gemini API.

bin.purpose: Contains all the executable files and tools.

bin/agent_tasks.py.purpose: Contains the tasks that the agent can perform.

bin/tool_utils.py.purpose: Contains the utility functions for the tools.

bin/tools.purpose: Contains all the tools that the agent can use.

bin/tools/automation/browser.py.purpose: Contains the tools for browser automation.

bin/tools/automation/droidrun.py.purpose: Contains the tools for droidrun automation.

bin/tools/automation/ui.py.purpose: Contains the tools for UI automation.

bin/tools/cm.py.purpose: Contains the tools for interacting with the CM.

bin/tools/core.py.purpose: Contains the core tools that the agent can use.

bin/tools/database.py.purpose: Contains the tools for interacting with the database.

bin/tools/file_ops.py.purpose: Contains the tools for file operations.

bin/tools/git.py.purpose: Contains the tools for interacting with git.

bin/tools/nlp.py.purpose: Contains the tools for interacting with the nlp.

bin/tools/memory.py.purpose: Contains the tools for interacting with the agent's memory.

bin/tools/web.py.purpose: Contains the tools for interacting with the web.

config.py.purpose: Contains the configuration for the project.

delete_collections.py.purpose: Deletes the collections from the database.

main.py.purpose: The main entry point for the project.

requirements.txt.purpose: Contains the dependencies for the project.

tests.purpose: Contains all the tests for the project.

tests/agent_verify_prompt.py.purpose: Contains the tests for the agent's prompt verification.

tui_agent.py.purpose: Contains the TUI for the agent.

utils.purpose: Contains all the utility functions for the project.

utils/file_system.py.purpose: Contains the file system utility functions.
